casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Wayne MAREADY. No. 32A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Daniel R. Pollitt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Maready. Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App, ___, 654 S.E.2d 769 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of January 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
